hero.title: Build the Future with JASIQ Labs
hero.subtitle: Join a team where code meets innovation. We don't just hire employees; we partner with problem solvers who want to master the MERN stack.

whyUs.title: Learning Culture
whyUs.desc: Forget boring tutorials. Here you work on live production servers and real client databases.

whyUs.title: Innovation First
whyUs.desc: We experiment with AI Agents, Blockchain, and the latest React patterns every day.

whyUs.title: Ownership

whoCanApply.title: Students & Interns
whoCanApply.desc: Current students looking for industrial training or summer internships. You want real project exposure, not just theory.

whoCanApply.title: Fresh Graduates
whoCanApply.desc: 0-1 years of experience. You know the basics of coding (MERN/Java) and are ready to build scalable applications.

whoCanApply.title: Professionals
